title: The Beginning of the Story
desc: Explore the start of the story where Mother Duck lays her eggs and notices one egg is different.
prompt_en: Describe the beginning of the story where Mother Duck lays her eggs and finds one egg different. What feelings might she have?
prompt_zh: 描述故事開始時，鴨媽媽下蛋並發現有一顆蛋與眾不同。她可能有什麼感受？
sample_questions: Why do you think one egg was different from the others?
How do you think Mother Duck felt when she noticed the different egg?
What do you think will happen to the different egg?

title: Hatching of the Ducklings
desc: Discuss the moment when the eggs start to hatch and the ducklings come out, except one egg.
prompt_en: Talk about the hatching of the ducklings and the moment when all eggs hatch except one. How does Mother Duck react?
prompt_zh: 談談鴨蛋孵化的時刻，除了最後一顆蛋外，其他都孵出了小鴨。鴨媽媽有什麼反應？
sample_questions: Why do you think the last egg took so long to hatch?
How did Mother Duck show her care for the last egg?
What emotions might the mother feel seeing the last egg still unhatched?

title: The Ugly Duckling is Born
desc: Explore the birth of the ugly duckling and how it differs from its siblings.
prompt_en: Describe the birth of the ugly duckling and how it looks different from the other ducklings. How does this affect the mother and siblings?
prompt_zh: 描述醜小鴨的誕生及其與其他小鴨的不同。這對鴨媽媽和兄弟姐妹有什麼影響？
sample_questions: Why was the ugly duckling different from the others?
How did the mother react to the ugly duckling?
How did the siblings treat the ugly duckling?

title: The Ugly Duckling Faces Rejection
desc: Discuss how the ugly duckling is treated by others and how it feels about itself.
prompt_en: Talk about the rejection the ugly duckling faces from its siblings and other animals. How does it feel about itself?
prompt_zh: 談談醜小鴨被兄弟姐妹和其他動物拒絕的情況。它對自己有什麼感覺？
sample_questions: Why did the siblings and other animals reject the ugly duckling?
How do you think the ugly duckling felt when others laughed at it?
What would you do if you were in the ugly duckling's place?

title: The Ugly Duckling's Journey
desc: Explore the journey of the ugly duckling as it leaves home and faces challenges in the forest and winter.
prompt_en: Describe the ugly duckling's journey after leaving home. What challenges does it face in the forest and winter?
prompt_zh: 描述醜小鴨離家後的旅程。它在森林和冬天遇到了什麼挑戰？
sample_questions: Why did the ugly duckling decide to leave home?
What difficulties did the ugly duckling face during winter?
How did other animals treat the ugly duckling during its journey?

title: The Ugly Duckling Finds a New Home
desc: Discuss the ugly duckling's brief stay with a peasant family and why it leaves again.
prompt_en: Talk about the ugly duckling's time with the peasant family and why it decides to leave again.
prompt_zh: 談談醜小鴨在農夫家短暫的生活以及為什麼又離開了。
sample_questions: How was the ugly duckling treated by the peasant family?
Why did the ugly duckling leave the peasant's house?
What does this part of the story tell us about acceptance?

title: Transformation and Realization
desc: Explore the moment when the ugly duckling sees its reflection and realizes it has become a beautiful swan.
prompt_en: Describe the moment the ugly duckling sees its reflection and realizes it has transformed into a swan. How does this change its feelings?
prompt_zh: 描述醜小鴨看到自己的倒影並意識到自己變成天鵝的時刻。這如何改變了它的感受？
sample_questions: How did the ugly duckling feel when it saw its reflection?
Why was the ugly duckling different from its siblings?
What lesson can we learn from the ugly duckling's transformation?

title: Happy Ending
desc: Discuss the happy ending where the swan marries and lives happily ever after.
prompt_en: Talk about the happy ending of the story where the swan finds love and happiness. What message does this ending give?
prompt_zh: 談談故事的快樂結局，天鵝找到愛情並幸福地生活。這個結局傳達了什麼訊息？
sample_questions: What does the happy ending tell us about self-acceptance?
How does the story inspire people who feel different?
Why is it important to be patient and hopeful like the ugly duckling?
